content: NEW YORK. Someone is trying to profit by selling a video that claims to show Ashley Biden, daughter of the vice president, snorting cocaine at a party in Delaware this year. Radaronline, the New York Post, the National Enquirer and other tabloids reported having been shown the video that shows a women who resembles Biden snorting three lines of cocaine after joking that they aren’t big enough. The reports conflicted in some of the details, including whether the woman said to be Biden, was aware of being filmed, and the asking price ranging between $200,000 and $400,000. Read more: "http://www.metro.us/us/article/2009/03/30/04/4905-82/index.xml" "A government big enough to give you everything you want, is strong enough to take everything you have." ~ Gerald Ford

content: If untrue, I hope somebody cleans the clock of the scumbag peddling the flic. If true, I sympathize with the Biden's and hope they are able to deal with the issue ... privately ... and that somebody still cleans the clock of the scumbag peddling the flic. I resented some making an issue of the Bush's daughters and Palin's daughter. I will equally resent the same being done here. This is an instance where "payback", IMHO, is not appropriate.

content: "http://www.wowowow.com/politics/ashley-biden-vps-daughter-video-cocaine-scandal-254008" A 43-minute tape that allegedly shows the vice president’s daughter doing the drug has been offered for sale though a DC lawyer. Snippets of the tape have been viewed by several media outlets, including the New York Post and Radaronline.com, which report that the footage shows her snorting several lines of the powder while at a party and, at another point, shouting "Shut the **** up!" She also allegedly jokes that the lines of coke aren’t big enough. So far no one has bought the tape — the Post says the price is $400,000; Radaronline says it would have cost them $250,000 — but the damage is done. "A government big enough to give you everything you want, is strong enough to take everything you have." ~ Gerald Ford

content: quote: Originally posted by EAG154: Most likely a trash story from a dung heap media turd! "http://www.nypost.com/seven/03302009/news/politics/parties__pot_in_biden_kids_past_162014.htm" A decade before a friend came forward trying to sell a video that he claimed showed her snorting cocaine, Vice President Joseph Biden's daughter was busted for pot possession. Ashley Biden "was a hot freshman that every guy wanted to be with," said Nat Berman, a Tulane University classmate, who said he bailed Ashley out of jail after her 1999 marijuana arrest in New Orleans, for which no conviction was recorded. "A government big enough to give you everything you want, is strong enough to take everything you have." ~ Gerald Ford

content: NEW YORK. Someone is trying to profit by selling a video that claims to show Ashley Biden, daughter of the vice president, snorting cocaine at a party in Delaware this year. Radaronline, the New York Post, the National Enquirer and other tabloids reported having been shown the video that shows a women who resembles Biden snorting three lines of cocaine after joking that they aren’t big enough. The reports conflicted in some of the details, including whether the woman said to be Biden, was aware of being filmed, and the asking price ranging between $200,000 and $400,000. Read more: "http://www.metro.us/us/article/2009/03/30/04/4905-82/index.xml" "A government big enough to give you everything you want, is strong enough to take everything you have." ~ Gerald Ford

content: "http://www.wowowow.com/politics/ashley-biden-vps-daughter-video-cocaine-scandal-254008" A 43-minute tape that allegedly shows the vice president’s daughter doing the drug has been offered for sale though a DC lawyer. Snippets of the tape have been viewed by several media outlets, including the New York Post and Radaronline.com, which report that the footage shows her snorting several lines of the powder while at a party and, at another point, shouting "Shut the **** up!" She also allegedly jokes that the lines of coke aren’t big enough. So far no one has bought the tape — the Post says the price is $400,000; Radaronline says it would have cost them $250,000 — but the damage is done. "A government big enough to give you everything you want, is strong enough to take everything you have." ~ Gerald Ford

reply: I understand what you are saying. My point is, Palins daughter was underage where Bidens daughter is 27. Todays politics remind me of an old saying. - "Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas?" - Joseph Stalin

content: Does it Make Joe Biden Look Bad? Yes, especially as former Drug Czar. Is Joe Biden responsible? No, if anything I feel bad for the family, there is likely a private hell in that household over this. But how can he(Or anyone else) control a 27 year old adults actions? Parents have a Hard enough time controlling 15 year old minors.
